attributes.action: add Fibromyalgia Syndrome and Chronic Fatigue Syndrome to the list for free prescriptions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Fibromyalgia Syndrome and Chronic Fatigue Syndrome are for most permanent and with us for life. The list of conditions that gets free prescriptions is outdated and Fibromyalgia Syndrome and Chronic Fatigue Syndrome should be on it. Many are unable to afford medication.
